# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(example LANGUAGES CXX)
set(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID ${CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID})

# target
add_library(InternetProtocol INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(InternetProtocol INTERFACE
    include
)
target_include_directories(InternetProtocol INTERFACE
    include
)
# target
add_executable(example "")
set_target_properties(example PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "example")
set_target_properties(example PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
add_dependencies(example InternetProtocol)
target_include_directories(example PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(example SYSTEM PRIVATE
    /home/nathan/.xmake/packages/a/asio/1.34.2/08f9e97208304bfe9403bd2884513fa1/include
)
target_compile_options(example PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(example PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(example PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(example PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(example PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
else()
    target_compile_options(example PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(CURRENT_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "MSVC")
    set_property(TARGET example PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(example PRIVATE
    ssl
    crypto
)
target_link_options(example PRIVATE
    -m64
)
# private sourcefiles from sourcebatch c++.build for target example
target_sources(example PRIVATE 
    src/main.cpp
)
